php.LBL_MAGENTO_ALERT: Khuyến nghị thực hiện mọi thay đổi cấu hình trước khi bắt đầu đồng bộ. Thay đổi được thực hiện trong khi đồng bộ sẽ có thể gây ra lỗi.
php.LBL_STORAGE_ID_TOOLTIP: Kho lưu trữ để liên kết với đơn hàng của Magento
php.LBL_SHIPPING_SERVICE_ID_TOOLTIP:
Mục bổ sung trong hoá đơn hoặc đơn đặt khi có 1 chi phí giao hàng.
Giá trị này được tải về từ chi phí vận chuyển trong Magento.
php.LBL_PAYMENT_PAYPAL_SERVICE_ID: Dịch vụ thanh toán Paypal Express thanh toán
php.LBL_PAYMENT_PAYPAL_SERVICE_ID_TOOLTIP:
Additional item in invoice or order when payment via PayPal Express was selected.
The value is calculated based on the fields: grand_total - subtotal - discount_amount - shipping_amount
php.LBL_PAYMENT_CASH_SERVICE_ID_TOOLTIP:
Additional item in invoice or order when payment on delivery is selected.
The value is calculated based on the fields: grand_total - subtotal - discount_amount - shipping_amount
php.LBL_SYNC_CURRENCY_TOOLTIP:
The synchronization will automatically add the currencies available in Magento to the system.
Disabling this option will result in skipping items downloaded from Magento when the currency does not exist in CRM
php.LBL_SYNC_CUSTOMERS_TOOLTIP:
The synchronization will automatically add Contacts and Accounts to the system and works only one way (from Magento to YetiForce).
Before creating a record, the system verifies whether this Contact/Account already exists, Contacts are verified by email address and Accounts by VAT ID.
If the record already exists in the system, it is not updated.
php.LBL_SYNC_ORDERS_TOOLTIP: Orders are synchronized both ways. Complete order data is downloaded from Magento to YetiForce and from YetiForce to Magento, only the status is downloaded.
php.LBL_SYNC_INVOICES_TOOLTIP: Sales invoices are synchronized only one way (from Magento to YetiForce).
php.LBL_STORAGE_QUANTITY_LOCATION_TOOLTIP:
Storage quantity location used to synchronize product quantities.
The option works only if storage is selected (the field above)
php.LBL_PRODUCT_IMAGES_PATH_TOOLTIP: Path to Magento images folder e.g. 'media/catalog/product/'
php.LBL_PRODUCT_MAP_CLASS_TOOLTIP: If you want to use custom field map you need to create new class in Maps/Custom. After that you need to change this value e.g. 'App\Integrations\Magento\Synchronizer\Maps\Custom\Product'
php.LBL_INVOICE_MAP_CLASS: Tên lớp ánh xạ hoá đơn
php.LBL_INVOICE_MAP_CLASS_TOOLTIP: If you want to use custom field map you need to create new class in Maps/Custom. After that you need to change this value e.g. 'App\Integrations\Magento\Synchronizer\Maps\Custom\Invoice'
php.LBL_ORDER_MAP_CLASS_TOOLTIP: If you want to use custom field map you need to create new class in Maps/Custom. After that you need to change this value e.g. 'App\Integrations\Magento\Synchronizer\Maps\Custom\Order'
php.LBL_CUSTOMER_MAP_CLASS_TOOLTIP: If you want to use custom field map you need to create new class in Maps/Custom. After that you need to change this value e.g. 'App\Integrations\Magento\Synchronizer\Maps\Custom\Customer'
php.LBL_CATEGORIES_LIMIT: The maximum number of categories that can be downloaded at a time
php.LBL_PRODUCTS_LIMIT: The maximum number of products that can be updated at a time
php.LBL_CUSTOMERS_LIMIT: The maximum number of customers that can be downloaded at a time
php.LBL_ORDERS_LIMIT: The maximum number of orders that can be downloaded at a time
php.LBL_INVOICES_LIMIT: The maximum number of invoices that can be downloaded at a time
php.LBL_RELOAD_MESSAGE: Dữ liệu sẽ được tải về một lần nữa khi lịch chạy cron tiếp theo được kích hoạt
